alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Fisher; Jones; Nolan; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 2:28AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Callahan, Jones, Nolan, western Shackelford, Taylor and Fisher Counties, including the I-20 corridor through 330 AM CDT... At 227 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms in Fisher and Jones Counties. These storms were moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Sweetwater, Clyde, Stamford, Anson, Hamlin, Baird, Roscoe, Wylie, Nolan, Merkel, Rotan, Tye, Tuscola, Roby, Hawley, Buffalo Gap, Lueders, Trent and Putnam. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 229 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Callahan; Fisher; Jones; Nolan; Shackelford; Taylor
